en.purpose: To calculate and record an individual's CHA2DS2-VASc score parameters and total score.
en.use:
Used for stroke risk stratification in patients with atrial fibrillation.

CHA2DS2-VASc is an acronym, with each factor contributing points to the total score:
-  Age 65 years 0p
- Age 65-74 years 1p 
- Age ≥75 years 2p
- Gender (Female) 1p
- Gender (Male) 0p
- Congestive heart failure 1p
- Hypertension 1p
- Diabetes 1p
- Stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 2p
- Vascular disease 1p


The maximum score is 9p and the result is interpreted as;
0p - low risk
1p - intermediate risk
2p or more - high risk

Further interpretation in accordance with:
0p- stroke risk 0,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 0,3% per year
1p - stroke risk 0,6% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 0,9% per year
2p - stroke risk 2,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 2,9% per year
3p - stroke risk 3,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 4,6% per year
4p - stroke risk 4,8% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 6,7% per year
5p - stroke risk 7,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 10,0% per year
6p - stroke risk 9,7% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 13,6% per year
7p - stroke risk 11,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 15,7% per year
8p - stroke risk 10,8% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 15,2% per year
9p - stroke risk 12,2% per year, risk of stroke/TIA/thromboembolism 17,4% per year
en.misuse:
Not to be used in patients with no diagnosis of atrial fibrillation.

Presence of other thrombotic risk factors (e.g., impaired renal function) may adversely impact the performance of this score. Interpretation of this score in such patients should be made with caution and with consideration of individual clinical contexts.

gt0001.description: A score used to calculate stroke risk for patients with atrial fibrillation. It facilitates the annual stratification of thromboembolic (TE) and ischemic stroke risk in patients with non-valvular atrial fibrillation (AF).

gt0008.text: Vascular disease (prior MI, peripheral artery disease, or aortic plaque)
